refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The gz_compress returns its argument compressed with the gzip algorithm. The argument and return values are arbitrary strings, possibly including any 8 bit characters.

refsect2.title: str
refsect2.para: The string containing data to be compressed.

refsect1.title: Return Types
refsect1.para: A string containing the compressed data.

example.title: GZIP test 2
